name: build-checker-app
description: Application using ReactJS  + NodeJS for to monitor build/deploy status in your Continuous Integration server

packageJSON.name: build-checker-app
packageJSON.description: Electron application boilerplate based on React, React Router, Webpack, React Hot Loader for rapid application development

scripts.build-css: node-sass app/styles/main.scss app/app.global.css && node-sass app/styles/main.scss app/app.global.css --output-style compressed -w --recursive app/styles
scripts.dev: concurrently --kill-others "npm run build-css" "npm run hot-server" "npm run start-hot"

releases.name: Version 0.0.10
